PreToolUse.command: if grep -qE '(git commit|nh os switch|nh darwin switch)' <<< '$command'; then ./.claude/pre-commit-validate.sh; fi

PostToolUse.command: if grep -qE '\.(nix|nixos)$' <<< '$file_path'; then alejandra --check '$file_path' 2>/dev/null || (alejandra '$file_path' 2>&1 | head -10 && echo '[âœ“ auto-formatted with alejandra]') || echo '[alejandra formatting skipped]'; fi
if grep -qE '\.(nix|nixos)$' <<< '$file_path'; then statix check '$file_path' 2>&1 | grep -E '(warning|error):' || true; fi
if grep -qE '\.(nix|nixos)$' <<< '$file_path'; then deadnix -f '$file_path' 2>&1 | grep -v '^$' | head -5 || true; fi
